item.title: I played more than 30 metroidvanias this year other than Silksong, and these are the ones doing the most creative, experimental things with the genre
item.description:
I played more than 30 metroidvanias this year other than Silksong, and these are the ones doing the most creative, experimental things with the genre

Actually unpacked Silksong fillers and other platformers evolving from concepts.
